verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Tune: "Look ye saints the sight ..."
Lo He comes with clouds descending
Once for favored sinners slain
Thousand thousand saints attending
Swell the triumph of His train
Alleluia Alleluia
God appears on earth to reign

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Every eye shall now behold Him
Robbed in dreadful majesty
Those who set at naught and sold Him
Pierced and nailed Him to the tree
Deeply wailing deeply wailing
Shall the true Messiah see

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Now redemption long expected
See in solemn pomp appear
All His saints by men rejected
Now shall meet Him in the air
Alleluia Alleluia
See the day of God appear

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Lo the tokens of His passion
Though in glory still He bears
Cause of endless exultation
To His ransomed worshippers
Alleluia Alleluia
Christ the Lamb of God appears

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
'Tis Thy heavely bride and Spirit
Jesus Lord that bid Thee come
All the glory to inherit
And to take Thy people home
All creation All creation
Travails groans till Thou shat come

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Yea Amen let all adore Thee
High on Thine eteranal Throne
Savior take the pow'r and glory
Claim the kingdom for Thine own
O come quickly O come quickly
Everlasting God come down
